title: Can we please get one free dodge?
body:
Give it some sort of timer, or "Play x amount of games without dodging to have it reset" because honestly when I have a very poor game with very negative people and I report and block them all and then get literally all of them again the very next queue that's not cool and I get punished for not wanting to deal with the repeat toxicity with a 6 minute queue restriction (If not more if it happens multiple times a day).

Literally make there a button that's locked unless someone you've got blocked is in the game that says "Get me out of here" because being honest people don't just block people for no reason. They block them because they literally never want to play with them ever again.

replies.body: Maybe and I say MAYBE 1 dodge every 3 days at the maximum. I would lose my freaking mind with how many times I have been in a game, oops someone left, ok now someone didn't accept it, and ok they didnt accept it again, FINALLY...... oh shit I have been autofilled.
